an8.21:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava vesaliyam viharati mahavane kutagarasalayam.
an8.21:1.3: “atthahi, bhikkhave, acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannagatam uggam gahapatim vesalikam dharetha”ti.
an8.21:1.5: Idam vatvana sugato utthayasana viharam pavisi.
an8.21:2.1: Atha kho annataro bhikkhu pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya yena uggassa gahapatino vesalikassa nivesanam tenupasankami; upasankamitva pannatte asane nisidi.
an8.21:2.2: Atha kho uggo gahapati vesaliko yena so bhikkhu tenupasankami; upasankamitva tam bhikkhum abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho uggam gahapatim vesalikam so bhikkhu etadavoca:
an8.21:3.1: “Atthahi kho tvam, gahapati, acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannagato bhagavata byakato.
an8.21:3.2: Katame te, gahapati, attha acchariya abbhuta dhamma, yehi tvam samannagato bhagavata byakato”ti?
an8.21:3.4: ‘katamehi atthahi acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannagato bhagavata byakato’ti.
an8.21:3.5: Api ca, bhante, ye me attha acchariya abbhuta dhamma samvijjanti,;
an8.21:3.6: tam sunohi, sadhukam manasi karohi, bhasissami”ti.
an8.21:3.7: “Evam, gahapati”ti kho so bhikkhu uggassa gahapatino vesalikassa paccassosi.
an8.21:3.10: saha dassaneneva me, bhante, bhagavato cittam pasidi.
an8.21:3.11: Ayam kho me, bhante, pathamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo samvijjati.
an8.21:4.1: So kho aham, bhante, pasannacitto bhagavantam payirupasim.
an8.21:4.2: Tassa me bhagava anupubbim katham kathesi, seyyathidam—
an8.21:4.3: danakatham silakatham saggakatham; kamanam adinavam okaram sankilesam, nekkhamme anisamsam pakasesi.
an8.21:4.4: Yada mam bhagava annasi kallacittam muducittam vinivaranacittam udaggacittam pasannacittam, atha ya buddhanam samukkamsika dhammadesana tam pakasesi—
an8.21:4.6: Seyyathapi nama suddham vattham apagatakalakam sammadeva rajanam patigganheyya;
an8.21:4.7: evamevam kho me tasmimyeva asane virajam vitamalam dhammacakkhum udapadi:
an8.21:4.9: So kho aham, bhante, ditthadhammo pattadhammo viditadhammo pariyogalhadhammo tinnavicikiccho vigatakathankatho vesarajjappatto aparappaccayo satthusasane
an8.21:4.10: tattheva buddhanca dhammanca sanghanca saranam agamasim, brahmacariyapancamani ca sikkhapadani samadiyim.
an8.21:4.11: Ayam kho me, bhante, dutiyo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo samvijjati.
an8.21:5.1: Tassa mayham, bhante, catasso komariyo pajapatiyo ahesum.
an8.21:5.2: Atha khvaham, bhante, yena ta pajapatiyo tenupasankamim; upasankamitva ta pajapatiyo etadavacam:
an8.21:5.4: Ya icchati sa idheva bhoge ca bhunjatu punnani ca karotu, sakani va natikulani gacchatu.
an8.21:5.5: Hoti va pana purisadhippayo, kassa vo dammi’ti?
an8.21:5.6: Evam vutte, sa, bhante, jettha pajapati mam etadavoca:
an8.21:5.8: Atha kho aham, bhante, tam purisam pakkosapetva vamena hatthena pajapatim gahetva dakkhinena hatthena bhingaram gahetva tassa purisassa onojesim.
an8.21:5.9: Komarim kho panaham, bhante, daram pariccajanto nabhijanami cittassa annathattam.
an8.21:5.10: Ayam kho me, bhante, tatiyo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo samvijjati.
an8.21:6.1: Samvijjanti kho pana me, bhante, kule bhoga.
an8.21:6.2: Te ca kho appativibhatta silavantehi kalyanadhammehi.
an8.21:6.3: Ayam kho me, bhante, catuttho acchariyo abbhuto dhammo samvijjati.
an8.21:7.1: Yam kho panaham, bhante, bhikkhum payirupasami;
an8.21:7.3: Ayam kho me, bhante, pancamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo samvijjati.
an8.21:8.1: So ce, bhante, me ayasma dhammam deseti;
an8.21:8.3: No ce me so ayasma dhammam deseti, ahamassa dhammam desemi.
an8.21:8.4: Ayam kho me, bhante, chattho acchariyo abbhuto dhammo samvijjati.
an8.21:9.1: Anacchariyam kho pana mam, bhante, devata upasankamitva arocenti:
an8.21:9.3: Evam vutte, aham, bhante, ta devata evam vadami:
an8.21:9.4: ‘vadeyyatha va evam kho tumhe devata no va vadeyyatha, atha kho svakkhato bhagavata dhammo’ti.
an8.21:9.5: Na kho panaham, bhante, abhijanami tatonidanam cittassa unnatim:
an8.21:9.6: ‘mam va devata upasankamanti, aham va devatahi saddhim sallapami’ti.
an8.21:9.7: Ayam kho me, bhante, sattamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo samvijjati.
an8.21:10.1: Yanimani, bhante, bhagavata desitani pancorambhagiyani samyojanani, naham tesam kinci attani appahinam samanupassami.
an8.21:10.2: Ayam kho me, bhante, atthamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo samvijjati.
an8.21:11.1: Ime kho me, bhante, attha acchariya abbhuta dhamma samvijjanti.
an8.21:11.3: katamehi caham atthahi acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannagato bhagavata byakato”ti.
an8.21:12.1: Atha kho so bhikkhu uggassa gahapatino vesalikassa nivesane pindapatam gahetva utthayasana pakkami.
an8.21:12.2: Atha kho so bhikkhu pacchabhattam pindapatapatikkanto yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi.
an8.21:12.3: Ekamantam nisinno kho so bhikkhu yavatako ahosi uggena gahapatina vesalikena saddhim kathasallapo, tam sabbam bhagavato arocesi.
an8.21:13.2: Yatha tam uggo gahapati vesaliko samma byakaramano byakareyya, imeheva kho, bhikkhu, atthahi acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannagato uggo gahapati vesaliko maya byakato.
an8.21:13.3: Imehi ca pana, bhikkhu, atthahi acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannagatam uggam gahapatim vesalikam dharehi”ti.
